title.rendered: Building a Thriving Business Through the Online Consumer

content.rendered:
Building a Thriving Business Through the Online Consumer

Watch this webinar recording to learn how expert agent Brian Gangawer has gone from clientless rookie to closing 50+ deals a year. The reason for Brian’s success: his lead generation philosophy and detailed processes for following up with and converting online consumers.

From learning the first things you should do upon receiving a new lead to getting online consumers to stop searching elsewhere and work with you, Brian will give you insight into how to build a thriving business.

Watch the recording to learn how Brian built his thriving business, including:

  • A tried-and-true lead generation philosophy
  • Processes for lead follow-up and conversion
  • Keeping in touch with past clients to get repeat business
  • Lessons you can learn from his mistakes
  • And more!

Get More Buyer and Seller Leads!

With Market Leader, you can get a guaranteed number of buyer and seller leads every month. These leads are exclusive — not shared with other agents. Lead inventory is limited, so check availability in your desired areas today!

Check Lead Availability
